author: Gabriel de Souza Pereira Moreira
title: Photo StoryTelling - Leveraging Generative AI and Google API
description:
What if we could use Generative AI to express with words what our photos represent, and have AI composing a storytelling about your moments?

In this post you'll learn how you can get a blog post automatically generated from a photo album using Google APIs: Maps, Vertex Imagen, and Palm.
